How to Uninstall

  • How to Uninstall
    • Mac (OSX)/Windows

This guide will show you how to quickly uninstall RPSG

Mac (OSX)/Windows

  1. Open Command Prompt/Terminal (depending on OS)
  2. Type in gem uninstall rpsg
  3. Hit Enter/Return (depending on OS)
  4. Confirm Uninstallation
